originalText.text:
Dr. Alsamrrai treated me with IV ketamine therapy and it has truly changed my life in such a positive way. I tried so many treatments for my depression before I found therafusion but nothing worked. Now I am finally working again and my mental health has improved so much.
I have recommended Therafusion to my friends and family. Very attentive, professional, and compassionate staff. The doctor was very patient and knowledgeable and was there for me every step of the way. I felt very safe knowing I was in good hands.

I have recommended Therafusion to my friends and family. Very attentive, professional, and compassionate staff. The doctor was very patient and knowledgeable and was there for me every step of the way. I felt very safe knowing I was in good hands.

originalText.text:
I am incredibly thankful to Dr. Al-Samrrai and his entire team! I have struggled with severe depression for the past fifteen years and I had probably tried every treatment under the sun. Dr. Al-Samrrai treated me with a series of six IV ketamine therapy infusions and what can I even say?! I feel like a completely different person! My husband and my kids have told me how shocked they are by how much livelier and happier I seem. I can’t remember the last time I have been able to approach my life in such an optimistic manner.
For anyone who has lived in my shoes - feeling hopeless, feeling like your depression will never go away - I would 100% hands down recommend IV ketamine therapy with Dr. Al-Samrrai. His excellent bedside manner, top-notch medical care, and continued support and guidance throughout the entire process exceeded all my expectations beyond what words can express.
